title: Riot you are a joke
body:
Riot, 
I want to start off with saying that your staff must be composed of a bunch of adolescence  who's father/mother never even scolded them.  I have put more years into this game than most, and don't let me even get started on how many people I've introduced to YOUR game.  The amount of money my friends and I have supported this game with is enough to make me regret ever doing it (which I never do).  For me to be banned 14 days, **without first giving a chat restriction**, due to simply using the term %%% (which means ---> a tiring or unwelcome task) in a NORMAL DRAFT is unacceptable.  How does one have the audacity to even think this is correct punishment.

I want to know the community's stand point on this topic.  I have only received one chat restriction which was 3 years ago, and have behaved since.  

PLEASE PROVIDE FEED BACK

Remember, for the most part Riot never skips punishment tiers with the IFS system, so either you were so toxic you got escalated to a perma-ban, or the more likely of the two, you were inherently toxic to your teammates. This is the punishment tier system as follows;

> First Offense: 10 Game Chat Restriction
> Second Offense: 25 Game Chat Restriction
> Third Offense: Two Week Suspension
> Fourth Offense: Permanent Suspension

This means you either were escalated, or went through a 10 game chat restriction and a 25 game chat restriction, and did not change your attitude. Keep in mind, the chat logs you posted were not appropriate, nor tolerated in the community.

As for the idea of justice; you ruined a bunch of people's game by being toxic and being extremely rude. When you play this game, you agree to the Summoners Code/ToS, which explicitly states it does not tolerate this behavior. Just keep in mind, you still have time to reform and drop punishment tiers to not be permabanned.

When I said punishments are based on frequency and severity, not just one or the other.

Your logic appears to be "1st offense is 1st level of punishment, 2nd offense 2nd level of punishment"

The actual scale is "worse of the two" kind of thing.

So offense LEVEL is taken into account in addition to how frequently you offend.

For argument sake, take this example:

Offense level 1 with Frequency level 1 = Punishment level 1

Offense level 1 with Frequency level 2 = Punishment level 2

Offense level 2 with Frequency level 1 = Punishment level 2

Offense level 3 with Frequency level 1 = Punishment level 3

Offense level 1 with Frequency level 3 = Punishment level 3


You clearly fell into one of the last two examples. Not your logic of "frequency only matters." It's just ironic that you are so sarcastic about people's intelligence.
